long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coordinate with your workforce around when and where you're working, within parameters set by your company.

**Where** - Plan your office attendance by seeing who's in the office on which days and what desk capacity is available (no more wasted commutes!).

**When** - Pre-endorsed flexitime that syncs with your work calendar, for autonomy with accountability.

Blinktime helps you maintain a culture of trust, autonomy and transparency by making your flexible work culture visible for existing employees and prospective recruits. You'll also have access to high quality data (not surveys!) to better inform decisions that impact your teams.

Easily understand behaviours across different locations, departments and time periods for smarter office management and decision making. Blinktime's data gives you actionable intelligence for optimal benefit design, ESG reporting, and differentiating in recruitment.

Blinktime is ISO 27001 and 9001 certified and penetration tested by CREST approved testers.

In order to use this app, users must have an active Blinktime account. Please contact our support team for more details at support@blinktime.io.
